caption:
If I really wanted to mess y’all up, I’d do exactly what the world is doing now…
Pump you full of pills, tell you to sleep around, glorify porn, and shame you for wanting a husband and babies.
Then I’d convince you that killing your child is "self-care" and that trusting God makes you weak.

Nah.
I’m not falling for it—and you shouldn’t either.
The enemy doesn’t come waving a red flag—he comes selling “freedom” that leads straight to chains.

Truth is still truth—even if it’s unpopular.
.
.
